boardgame.name: BANG!
¡BANG!
Bang! Duelul Vestului Sălbatic
BANG! A vadnyugat játéka!
Wanted!
Wanted: Dead or Alive
Бэнг!
砰！
碰！
뱅!
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Outlaws hunt the Sheriff. The Sheriff hunts the Outlaws. The Renegade plots secretly, ready to take one side or the other. Bullets fly. Who among the gunmen is a Deputy, ready to sacrifice himself for the Sheriff? And who is a merciless Outlaw, willing to kill him? If you want to find out, just draw (your cards)!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (From back of box)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The card game BANG! recreates an old-fashioned spaghetti western shoot-out, with each player randomly receiving a Character card to determine special abilities, and a secret Role card to determine their goal._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Four different Roles are available, each with a unique victory condition:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Sheriff - Kill all Outlaws and the Renegade_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Deputy - Protect the Sheriff and kill any Outlaws_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Outlaw - Kill the Sheriff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Renegade - Be the last person standing_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A player's Role is kept secret, except for the Sheriff. Character cards are placed face up on table, and also track strength (hand limit) in addition to special ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are 22 different types of cards in the draw deck. Most common are the BANG! cards, which let you shoot at another player, assuming the target is within _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;range_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; of your current gun. The target player can play a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;MISSED!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card to dodge the shot. Other cards can provide temporary boosts while in play (for example, different guns to improve your firing range) and special one-time effects to help you or hinder your opponents (such as Beer to restore health, or Barrels to hide behind during a shootout). A horse is useful for keeping your distance from unruly neighbors, while the Winchester can hit a target at range 5. The Gatling is a deadly exception where range doesn't matter: it can only be used once, but targets all other players at the table!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Information on the cards is displayed using language-independent symbols, and 7 summary/reference cards are included._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save 30% or more off of every item we have listed on Boardgamegeek.com! Items are shipped within one or two business days upon reciept of payment (remember, money order, cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check or cash at your own risk!) If you do not wish to send payment and would rather pay us directly, you can give us a call at 816.554.7333 (Tuesday through Saturday) using Visa, Mastercard and American Express or by contacting us in order to make a Paypal payment (a 4.5% surcharge will be added to the total payment.) Shipping is based off of weight so it completely depends on the game(s) themselves though the average is $7 - $9.00 throughout the Continental US (and yes, we will combine on shipping!!!). If you need a specific type of shipping - such as Overnight or with Insurance - or have any questions, drop us an email. MO orders pay 7.35% sales tax. Also be sure to be on the lookout for PREORDER games being listed for the upcoming months! For more info about the store visit www.pfcomics.com (be sure to check out our forums for our weekly and monthly events).

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame.
